title: Analyze Audience Demographics
description: An editor wants to understand the demographic makeup (age, gender, location) of their website's audience to better tailor content.

tasks.description: Navigate to the 'Audience Demographics' section of the web analytics platform.
Analyze the age, gender, and geographic location data of the website's visitors over the last 6 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the primary demographics of the audience.

tasks.description: Create a summary report of the findings for the editorial team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team receives a clear picture of who their readers are.
